title: Higher / Lower
description: A live multiplayer guessing game where a host presents numbers and players compete to predict whether the next value will be higher or lower. The last player standing wins.

title: Project Beta
description: An open-source tool that simplifies developer workflows and boosts productivity. Downloaded by over 10k developers.

title: Project Gamma
description: Mobile-first design system with reusable components and comprehensive documentation.

title: Feedback Center
description: Feedback center launched from an action button in a modal. Allows the user to submit ideas, experiences, and issues. They can track each item and vote on other's ideas.

title: Project Delta
description: Data visualization dashboard with real-time analytics and interactive charts.
